races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable of the common races.
traits: Versatile - Gain one extra skill and language of your choice

races.name: Elf
races.description: Magical people of otherworldly grace, living in harmony with nature.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Keen Senses - Proficiency in Perception
Fey Ancestry - Advantage against being charmed
Trance - Don't sleep, meditate for 4 hours instead

subraces.name: High Elf
traits: Cantrip - Know one wizard cantrip
Weapon Training - Proficiency with longswords, shortbows

subraces.name: Wood Elf
traits: Weapon Training - Proficiency with longswords, shortbows
Fleet of Foot - Speed increases to 35 feet

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and craftspeople.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Dwarven Resilience - Advantage against poison
Stonecunning - Double proficiency on Intelligence (History) checks related to stonework

subraces.name: Hill Dwarf
traits: Dwarven Toughness - Hit point maximum increases by 1 per level

subraces.name: Mountain Dwarf
traits: Armor Proficiency - Proficiency with light and medium armor

races.name: Halfling
races.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice.
traits: Lucky - Reroll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
Brave - Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness - Move through space of Medium or larger creatures

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
traits: Naturally Stealthy - Hide even when obscured only by a larger creature

subraces.name: Stout Halfling
traits: Stout Resilience - Advantage on saving throws against poison

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Born of dragons, as their name proclaims, the dragonborn walk proudly through a world.
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Choose a dragon type for breath weapon and damage resistance
Breath Weapon - Exhale destructive energy as an action
Damage Resistance - Resistance to damage type associated with draconic ancestry

races.name: Gnome
races.description: A gnome's energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of their tiny body.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Gnome Cunning - Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
traits: Natural Illusionist - Know the minor illusion cantrip
Speak with Small Beasts - Communicate simple ideas with small animals

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
traits: Artificer's Lore - Double proficiency on History checks related to magic items
Tinker - Construct tiny clockwork devices

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither, half-elves combine human curiosity with elven refinement.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saving throws against being charmed
Versatile - Choose two ability scores to increase by 1 each

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Whether united under the leadership of a mighty warlock or fighting for survival, half-orcs endure.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Relentless Endurance - Drop to 1 hit point instead of 0 once per long rest
Savage Attacks - Roll one additional weapon damage die on critical hits

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: To be greeted with stares and whispers, tieflings know that their fiendish heritage is not easily hidden.
traits: Darkvision - See in dim light within 60 feet
Hellish Resistance - Resistance to fire damage
Infernal Legacy - Know thaumaturgy cantrip, gain hellish rebuke and darkness spells
